name: Getting started from scratch with Aseprite
Pixel logic
description: Pixel Logic is an in-depth pixel art tutorial book.

name: Make Your Own Pixel Art
description: Walks you step-by-step through the available tools, pixel art techniques, the importance of shapes, colors, shading, and how to turn your art into animation.

name: Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island
description: Play as Yoshi carrying Baby Mario, platforming through a dangerous world. The painted feel and soft pastel colors create an hearth-warming handmade style that breathes the charm of a children’s book.

name: FEZ
description: Explore a 2D retrofuturistic world by rotating in the third dimension. The minimalistic style, bright vibrant colors and dynamic lighting bring the 16-bit era into the future.

name: Superbrothers: Sword & Sworcery EP
description: Laid back adventure in a bronze age mountain wilderness. Dreamy soft colors in a living world affected by moon phases.

name: Shovel Knight: Treasure Trove
description: Classic action adventure with an 8-bit retro aesthetic, taking the looks of a modern NES game.

name: Hyper Light Drifter
description: Top-down action in a sci-fi world that radiates light and warmth. Using a colorful palette and kaleidoscopic neon yet setting a grim ambiance.

name: Owlboy
description: Explore a detailed steampunk world in the clouds. With it's range of endearing animations and expressions the world and it's characters come to life.

name: Stardew Valley
description: Manage a farm from a top-down perspective and engage with a charming and cheerful world in 16-bit.

name: Starbound
description: Travel across vibrant, colorful and expansive galaxies, including creative dynamic animations.

name: Void Golf
description: Shoot giant pieces of space rock into black holes, using gravitational fields, physics-defying walls and wormholes in a minimalist top-down view.

name: Sean Browning
description: Pixel Art Animation Reel 2018 - A collection of Sean Browning's pixel animations, ranging from simple scenes to recreations of popular shows like Steven's Universe and RWBY.

name: Pixel Paul
description: An Interview with Pixel Artist and Animator Paul Veer - Paul Veer, a professional pixel artist with work on games such as Super Crate Box, shares his interest in pixel art as well as his workflow and style breakdown.

name: MortMort channel
description: Creative videos & streams including tips, discussions and tutorials.

name: Lospec palette list
description: Collection of color palettes for pixel art with examples and artist information.

name: eBoy
description: German, pixel art group founded in 1997 by Kai Vermehr, Steffen Sauerteig and Svend Smital. They are regarded as the “Godfathers of Pixel Art”.

name: Paul Robertson
description: Australian, creating cute, sometimes cosmic and psychedelic, and sometimes weird nightmarish pixel art.

name: Syosa
description: Japanese, girlish style using bright and organic color palettes creating cute humans and animals.

name: Thomas Feichtmeir
description: Australian, dark and mature: fan of knights, dinosaurs, pirates, epic beasts, anatomy and history as well as everything twisted and weird.

name: Toyoi Yuuta
description: Australian, capturing small animated scenes of everyday life in unsaturated colors.

name: Slynyrd
description: American, game designer with tons of material, game specific knowledge and mini-tutorials.

name: Aseprite
description: Paid and source-available, works on Linux, macOS and Windows. Awesome UI with a lot of nifty tools to ease pixel art creation.

name: Pixen
description: Paid, works on macOS and iOS. Superb OS integration, create pixel art on a tablet using pressure-sensitive drawing.

name: Pro Motion
description: Paid with trial, works on Windows. Advanced features tailored to creating pixel art for games.

name: GIMP
description: Open source and free, works on Linux, macOS and Windows. Not specifically for creating pixel art but is more than capable to do so.

name: PixelCraft
description: Open source and free, works in the browser. Easy to try out in the browser and as a PWA offline.

name: rx
description: Open source and free, works on Linux, macOS and Windows. Minimalist and keyboard driven with animation support.

name: Wobblepaint
description: Pico8 editor that give life to pixel art with a little wobble.

name: Broider
description: Make 9-patch borders, export as CSS.

name: pixeldudesmaker
description: Small character generator, including basic animation.
